mapper.sql: id, phone, password, name, gender, id_card, community_name, building_number, unit_number, room_number, area_size, is_verified, created_at, status, disabled_by, disabled_at
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET phone = #{phone}, name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, id_card = #{idCard}, community_name = #{communityName}, building_number = #{buildingNumber}, unit_number = #{unitNumber}, room_number = #{roomNumber}, area_size = #{areaSize}, is_verified = #{isVerified} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT visi.id FROM vote_questions vq JOIN vote_option_set_items visi ON visi.set_id = vq.option_set_id WHERE vq.id = #{questionId} AND visi.option_text = #{optionText} LIMIT 1
